typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMP_ID as decimal(15,0),
		NAME as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		DEPARTMENT as decimal(15,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> empSource
empSource alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EMP_ID as decimal(15,0),
		NAME as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		DEPARTMENT as decimal(15,0)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['EMP_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true,
	mapColumn(
		EMP_ID,
		NAME,
		COUNTRY,
		DEPARTMENT
	)) ~> sink1
